content: Set up Hugo These are some steps to have a Hello World example of a blog using Hugo and GitHub Pages.
title: Setting up this environment

content: Step 1: Install Hugo sudo dnf install hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/#fedora-red-hat-and-centos
title: Setting up this environment

content: Step 2: Generate repo scaffolding git clone git@github.com:alvarolop/alvarolop.github.io.git cd alvarolop.github.io hugo new site . --force
title: Setting up this environment

content: Step 3: Add your theme I decided to create the blog using this trendy Hugo theme: https://themes.gohugo.io/themes/loveit/ git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git themes/loveit echo theme # \"loveit\" >> config.toml Other interesting themes: https://themes.gohugo.io/themes/hugo-papermod/ Full LoveIt documentation: https://hugoloveit.com/ hugo new posts/my-first-post.md hugo server -D
title: Setting up this environment
